alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 9:32AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Ventura County through 945 AM PST... At 931 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Ventura Harbor, or near Ventura, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oxnard... Ventura... Port Hueneme... and Ventura Harbor. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast
